**Match Details:**
- Match 9 of the Major League Cricket 2024 tournament
- Teams: MI New York vs Texas Super Kings
- Date: July 13, 2024
- Time: 12:30 AM
- Venue: Church Street Park, Morrisville

**Team Squads:**
- MI New York: 17 players, including Dewald Brevis, Kieron Pollard, Nicholas Pooran, Rashid Khan, and Trent Boult
- Texas Super Kings: 17 players, including Faf du Plessis, Dwayne Bravo, Marcus Stoinis, and Mitchell Santner

* ROOT SPORTS has partnered with Willow by Cricbuzz to broadcast Major League Cricket (MLC) matches live in the Pacific Northwest region.
* The live broadcasts will start on July 5, 2024, and will be available to cricket enthusiasts in Washington, Oregon, Montana, Idaho, and Alaska.
* This partnership aims to increase accessibility to the sport in the Pacific Northwest and help grow the game in America.
* Willow by Cricbuzz will distribute all MLC matches this season on TV and its dedicated streaming app.

Note: There is no information in the article about the teams, schedules, or other details specific to the MLC tournament itself, only about the broadcasting partnership.

**Match 10 Details**

The 10th match of the Major League Cricket tournament will be played between the LA Knight Riders and San Francisco Unicorns on July 13th at the Church Street Park, Morrisville.

**Current Form**

* LA Knight Riders are 4th on the points table with 1 win and 2 losses. Their top run scorer is Jason Roy with 97 runs, and top wicket taker is Spencer Johnson with 6 wickets. They lost their previous match against Seattle Orcas by 9 wickets.
* San Francisco Unicorns are 5th on the points table with 1 win and 1 loss. Their top run scorer is Matthew Short with 91 runs, and top wicket taker is Haris Rauf with 2 wickets. They lost their previous match against Texas Super Kings by 7 wickets.

**Previous Match Results**

* LA Knight Riders batted first and scored 168/5 in 20 overs, with Jason Roy and David Miller scoring 69 and 44 runs respectively, but lost to Seattle Orcas by 9 wickets.
* San Francisco Unicorns batted first and were bowled out for 127, with Finn Allen and Matthew Short scoring 10 and 33 runs respectively, and lost to Texas Super Kings by 7 wickets.

**Squads**

The squads for both teams are listed in the article, with notable players including Martin Guptill, Alex Carey, Andre Russell, and Sunil Narine for LA Knight Riders, and Pat Cummins, Jake Fraser-McGurk, and Haris Rauf for San Francisco Unicorns.

**Match Preview:**

The 9th match of the Major League Cricket tournament will be played between MI New York and Texas Super Kings on July 12th at Church Street Park, Morrisville.

**Current Form:**

* Texas Super Kings are currently 2nd on the points table with 1 win and 1 loss, having won their previous match against San Francisco Unicorns by 7 wickets.
* MI New York are 3rd on the points table with 1 win and 1 loss, having lost their previous match against Washington Freedom by 4 runs (DLS method).

**Top Performers:**

* Faf du Plessis is the top run-scorer for Texas Super Kings with 148 runs, while Mohammad Mohsin is their top wicket-taker with 4 scalps.
* Nicholas Pooran is the top run-scorer for MI New York with 106 runs, while Trent Boult is their top wicket-taker with 3 scalps.

**Squads:**

The squads for both teams are listed in the article.

**Predictions:**

The article predicts that MI New York will win the match, with Nicholas Pooran being the top batter and Rashid Khan being the top bowler. Rashid Khan is also predicted to be the player of the match.

**Match Details**: The 8th match of the Major League Cricket tournament will be played between Seattle Orcas and Washington Freedom on July 11th at the Grand Prairie Stadium, Texas.

**Current Form**:

* Seattle Orcas are currently at the bottom of the points table with 1 win and 1 loss. Their top run-scorer is Ryan Rickelton with 103 runs, and top wicket-taker is Zaman Khan with 3 scalps. They won their previous match against LA Knight Riders by 9 wickets.
* Washington Freedom are placed 2nd on the points table with 1 win and 1 loss. Their top run-scorer is Steven Smith with 72 runs, and top wicket-taker is Saurabh Netravalkar with 5 scalps. Their previous match against Texas Super Kings was washed out due to rain, and they lost their previous outing against MI New York by 4 runs (DLS method).

**Squads**: The article provides the squads for both Seattle Orcas and Washington Freedom.

**Predictions**:

* Washington Freedom are predicted to win the toss and the match.
* Top batter predictions are Travis Head (Washington Freedom) and Quinton de Kock (Seattle Orcas).
* Top bowler predictions are Saurabh Netravalkar (Washington Freedom) and Zaman Khan (Seattle Orcas).
* Most sixes predictions are Travis Head (Washington Freedom) and Quinton de Kock (Seattle Orcas).
* Player of the match prediction is Travis Head (Washington Freedom).
* Team scores batting first predictions are Washington Freedom 165+ and Seattle Orcas 155+.

* The Washington Freedom team defeated the Seattle Orcas by 5 wickets in a low-scoring match at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas, Texas.
* Lockie Ferguson (4/26) and Saurabh Netravalkar (3/18) were the top performers with the ball, helping to restrict Seattle Orcas to 124 runs in 19.4 overs.
* Lahiru Milantha (33* off 30) and Obus Pineaar (31* off 30) played a crucial role with the bat, guiding Washington Freedom to their target of 125 runs with 10 balls to spare.
* With this win, Washington Freedom moved to the top of the table with 5 points from three matches, remaining the only unbeaten team in the tournament so far.

**Points Table:**

Washington Freedom leads the table with 5 points, followed by Texas Super Kings, MI New York, and Los Angeles Knight Riders.

**Match Update:**

The 9th match between MI New York and Texas Super Kings was abandoned due to rain, with both teams sharing a point each.

**Upcoming Match:**

MI New York and Texas Super Kings will face each other again on July 14 in Texas.

**Top Run-Scorers:**

1. Faf du Plessis - 148 runs in 3 matches
2. Devon Conway - 124 runs in 3 matches
3. Ryan Rickelton - 107 runs in 2 matches
4. Nicholas Pooran - 106 runs in 2 matches
5. Jason Roy - 97 runs in 3 matches

**Note:** There is no information provided in the article about the top wicket-takers in the tournament.

**Match Result:** Washington Freedom defeated Seattle Orcas by 5 wickets in a low-scoring match at Grand Prairie Stadium, Dallas.

**Scores:** Seattle Orcas were bowled out for 124 in 19.4 overs, with Heinrich Klaasen top-scoring with 51. Washington Freedom chased down the target with 10 balls to spare, finishing at 125/5 in 18.2 overs. Lahiru Milantha (33*) and Obus Pienaar (31*) shared an unbeaten 63-run partnership to guide their team to victory.

**Standout Performers:** Lockie Ferguson (4/26) and Saurabh Netravalkar (3/18) were the standout bowlers for Washington Freedom, while Lahiru Milantha and Obus Pienaar were the heroes with the bat.

**Points Table:** With this win, Washington Freedom moved to the top of the points table with five points from three matches, remaining the only unbeaten team in the tournament.

**Weather and Pitch Report:**

**Dream11 Prediction:**

* Texas Super Kings are predicted to win the game due to the form of their key players.

**Match Details**

* The Los Angeles Knight Riders (LAS) will play against the San Francisco Unicorns (SF) in the 10th match of MLC 2024.
* The match will be played at Church Street Park in Morrisville, United States, on July 14th at 12:30 AM IST.

**Head-to-Head Stats**

* The San Francisco Unicorns have won both of their previous matches against the Los Angeles Knight Riders.

**Pitch Report**

* The pitch at Church Street Park is good for batting, with batsmen enjoying the surface and getting full value for their shots.
* The pacers have had to rely on cutters and variations in pace to be effective, while the spinners have also gotten some help from the wicket.
* The incessant rain may add moisture to the wicket and air, benefiting new ball bowlers at the start of the innings.

**Fantasy Cricket Tips**

* Top-order batters from both teams are good picks, as the pitch is best for batting in the first few overs.
* Spinners are the best pick for this match, but faster bowlers who can bowl into the wicket and rely on change of pace can also be effective.
* Keep more batters from the team that is chasing, as the wicket has been easier to bat on in the second innings.

**Top Player Picks**

* Unmukt Chand (LAS), Spencer Johnson (LAS), Matt Short (SF), and Abrar Ahmed (SF) are top picks for the match.

**Differential Picks**

* Andre Russell (LAS) and Jake Fraser-McGurk (SF) are differential picks who could prove to be game-changers if they get into rhythm.

* Seattle Orcas were defeated by Washington Freedom in a recent match.
* Lockie Ferguson took four wickets, while Saurabh Netravalkar picked three as Washington Freedom restricted Seattle Orcas to just 124 after putting them to bat.
* Washington Freedom won the match by 5 wickets, moving them to the top of the table.

* The pitch report suggests that Church Street Park is a batting-friendly pitch where chasing has been easy, with an average first-inning score of 154.
* The probable playing XIs for both teams are listed in the article, with Sunil Narine and Andre Russell being highlighted as crucial captaincy picks for the game.
* No injuries have been reported for either team, and both sides are expected to play with a full-strength squad.
* Fantasy cricket tips and team predictions are also provided in the article.

**Match Details:** Match 9 of the Major League Cricket 2024 tournament will be played between MI New York (MINY) and Texas Super Kings (TSK) on July 13, 2024, at Church Street Park, Morrisville.

**Previous Performances:**

* In Match 3, MI New York scored 154/9 in their 20 overs, with Nicholas Pooran contributing 44 off 30 balls and Rashid Khan adding 31 off 15 balls. Washington Freedom won the match by 4 runs using the DLS method.
* In Match 7, Texas Super Kings chased down a target of 128/3 in 12.5 overs, with Faf du Plessis scoring 34 off 17 balls, Aaron Hardie contributing 34 off 23 balls, and Devon Conway scoring 32 off 19 balls.

**Team News:** Both teams are performing well, with no injury concerns reported.

* The match was played between the Seattle Orcas and the Washington Freedom.
* Washington Freedom won the match, chasing down the target set by the Orcas with 5 wickets in hand.
* The Orcas struggled to build partnerships and were all out for 124 in 19.4 overs, with Heinrich Klaasen scoring 51 off 30 deliveries.
* Lockie Ferguson and Saurabh Netravalkar were the top bowlers for Washington Freedom, taking 4/26 and 3/18 respectively.
* In response, Washington Freedom reached the target in 18.2 overs, with Lahiru Milantha scoring an unbeaten 33 and Obus Pienaar contributing 31 not out.
* A notable moment in the match was Cameron Gannon's stunning delivery that dismissed Steve Smith of Washington Freedom, who was caught off guard by the ball's deceptive movement.
* The win is a significant one for Washington Freedom in the ongoing MLC 2024 season, and fans can expect more exciting clashes ahead in the tournament.

* In the MLC 2024, Washington Freedom defeated Seattle Orcas at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas.
* Seattle Orcas scored 124 runs in the first inning before being bowled out, setting a target of 125 runs for Washington Freedom.
* Washington Freedom successfully chased down the target, thanks to an outstanding performance by Rachin Ravindra.
* Ravindra scored 26 runs off 16 balls, including three fours and two sixes, at a striking rate of 162.50.
* His innings included a memorable over against Imad Wasim, in which he scored 17 runs with two sixes and a four.
* Washington Freedom comfortably reached the target in the 19th over, finishing with a score of 127 for 5 wickets.

Overall, the summary highlights the key moments and performances that led to Washington Freedom's convincing victory over Seattle Orcas in the MLC 2024 tournament.

**Match Details:**
- Match 9: MI New York (NY) vs Texas Super Kings (TEK)
- Date: July 13 (Saturday)
- Time: 12:30 AM IST
- Venue: Church Street Park, Morrisville

**Match Details**

The 9th match of the Major League Cricket 2024 tournament is between New York (NY) and Texas (TEX) on Saturday, 13th July 2024, at Church Street Park, Morrisville.

**Teams**

* New York (NY): Nicholas Pooran (wk), Kieron Pollard (c), Ruben Clinton, Monank Patel, Shayan Jahangir, Tim David, Rashid Khan, Trent Boult, Anrich Nortje, Nosthush Kenjige, Ehsan Adil, and others.
* Texas (TEX): Devon Conway (wk), Faf du Plessis (c), Aaron Hardie, Joshua Tromp, Milind Kumar, Mitchell Santner, Calvin Savage, Dwayne Bravo, Mohammad Mohsin, Naveen-ul-Haq, and others.

**Pitch and Weather Report**

The pitch is expected to be neutral, with the help of pacers. The weather is clean, with a temperature of 24°C, 88% humidity, and 3.6 km/h wind speed. There are no chances of precipitation during the game.

**Prediction**

Texas looks in good form in recent matches and is the favorite to win the match. According to the Possible11 expert toss prediction, TEX will win the toss and choose to bowl first.
